Accordng to Google and wikipedia the first firearms in Japan were 
flintloc=
ks and they came in around 1545 which would fit in with Yuyu
(spelling)Shin=
a's carrying one albeit a nonsensical one in 1604-four 
years after Sekigah=
ara. Some sources say guns came to Japan earlier and 
some say later like 1=
700's at a great battle or siege. What is agreed 
on however is the banning=
 and discouragement of using firearms for a 
good two centuries thereafter.=
 Did they use guns in 1615 at the uniting 
of the clans battle, I wonder? I=
 sometimes wonder if on InuYasha what 
would have happened to her world of =
the 20th/21st Centuries if Kagome 
had brought modern day weapons like stat=
e of the arts firearms to the 
Warring States Era when she visited IY and f=
riends? Maybe the youkai 
and hanyou would be running the world today and j=
udging from 
appearances, could they have done as badly as our modern leade=
rs have? 
I think not. Why? They are not politically motivated and care not=
 a 
whit about ruling (Naraku excluded) the world. More soon. Have a nice 
=
weekend and Kami bless you all. Ja Mata and Toodles-K&K
